REUTERS.UNKNOWN: Y E f3355 reute u f BC-/IMPERIAL-OIL-<IMO.A> 06-18 0056

TEXT.TITLE: IMPERIAL OIL <IMO.A> RAISES CRUDE 32 CANADIAN CTS
TEXT.BODY: Canadian Imperial Oil, 70 pct Exxon owned, said it raised its posting for light sweet crude oil at Edmonton by 32 canadian cts a barrel, effective today. The company said its new posting for light sweet crude oil at Edmonton is 25.60 canadian dlrs a barrel. Reuter
